column5: Took Lloyd up on his offer to go out today and took my two son's with me it was a great day out there marking lots of hooks every where the first fish came early so my youngest son took the rod and got him self a nice eye  then it was my son Mikes turn and he got him self a sheep head  he did get a nice eye as well then we got this guy at the end of the day  we did get him free with out any harm and he took off like nothing happened thanks to Lloyd for a great day  Rob
Great shooting!  Nice mixed bag you got there!  I take it that 3rd picture is a PB?
well they say a bird in the hand is worth 2 in the bush     looks like a fun day of fishing
wtg rob....always a fun day out with lloyd  i know which boat im following in november....lol....  cheers

I guess if you can't find them yourself.. hiring a guide is the way to go!!!  That's what Roy does when he want's to post a report!!!... that's why he doesn't post the self-timer pics... he's afraid Marc will show up in the pics!!!
Are seagulls in season? LOL   Must have been a handful in the boat.
Great Report. Thats a nice sized sheephead. Must have put up a good scrap.

Yeah Glen but when we go out with a guide I come home after boating 75 smallies or 15 walleyes or 5 muskies. You on the other hand are good enough to go it solo and then report on your 10" crappie or your 2 spots up to a pound or your half pound cat. I 'll stick to a guide once in a while to go home feeling like a man. And dontchya know only Marc's Summer afro show's up in the pics.
Not the bird they're talking about Terry !!!  HI from England lads!

gee.. you sound the same from over there    and I see they mean  a bird in the hand is worth 2 in the bush but if in that bush, a fair maiden should stand  then a push in the bush , could be worth 2 in the hand

Ah but our friend from down south does catch fish without guides here is the proof.  This was shot in Canada eh.No guide at all.    Great report Rob good to see you out with your boys.  Looking forward to seeing you and Your Bro in November.  Oh and I know what its like to catch Quinte seagulls.Here is a shot of one who took my lure in mid air    MTP
Good on ya for getting the boys out Rob.  I,ll bring the shotgun,just incase we have any followers out there come November.  Wayne,have you met the queen yet?LOL
No.. but I have drank in Will and Harry's favourite pub!...and drove past their polo field.  Leave it to Lloyd to get you a gull Rob !
Great report and pics Rob You guys sure got into a great mix bag..... some good looking ones in those pics Thanks for sharing Leechman

Well Like always great to have you out. Look forward to seeing you again soon. The fishing only got better as the weekend went on. Today fish were hungry!!!!!  That bird crap on my boat today, after all i did for him lol
